label: 木画
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: A decorative woodwork technique in which pieces of wood veneer, bamboo, ivory, horn, or other material are inlaid -sometimes with mosaic-like patterns- on a contrasting wood surface such as red sandalwood, ebony, or Chinese quince.
